4800000C D3FF0000
D3FF0004 80010010
7C0803A6 3821000C
4E800020 00000000

Updates kart coordinates based on touch screen input.
The "gameplay" screen of the Wii U GamePad will be forced into fullscreen.

 ⚠ Driving on anti-gravity will temporarily disable the freefly.

Info:
Line 1 is the starting address of variables used by this code. (Default: 10014854)

Game Version: 4.2

Modes Supported:
 • Battle (Offline / Online)
 • Grand Prix
 • Time Trials
 • VS Race (Offline / Online)

Players Supported:
 • Wii U GamePad

Enable:
 • Touch Screen

Default Data Used:
0x10014854 (8 bytes)

Source:
https://github.com/Mewtality/TCPGecko-MK8-Cheat-Codes
